meanings.definition: Relating to or along a tangent.
meanings.sent1: The tangential line touched the circle at just one point.
meanings.sent2: Her tangential comments during the meeting were distracting.
meanings.sent3: His tangential explanation of the topic left everyone confused.
meanings.sent4: The tangential relationship between the two characters added depth to the story.
meanings.sent5: The tangential road led us through the scenic route.

meanings.definition: Diverging from a main point or path.
meanings.sent1: The tangential discussion veered off course quickly.
meanings.sent2: Her tangential thoughts made it hard to follow her argument.
meanings.sent3: The tangential plot twist in the movie caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent4: His tangential reasoning led to an unexpected solution.
meanings.sent5: The tangential path through the forest was full of surprises.
